note: Thomas Knight. Conservation biologist. Dungeons & Dragons lover. Board game fanatic. Probably the only person alive to have been gored by a Nilgiri tahr. Have also held more kakapos than more than 8 billion other humans have. Even more than Stephen Fry, I'd wager. Liberal, in that I don't spread hate for people based on who they are- I am only intolerant of intolerance.

name: Who is Thomas?
value: He's just this guy, you know?

name: Website:
value: https://www.cheekykokako.com/

name: RPG of choice:
value: D&D 5E, but up for pretty much any others
